title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Informal Education and OER-Integrated Mathematics Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: One can explain methods for searching and curating elementary mathematics-related resources on OER platforms (e.g., Khan Academy, OER Commons).
One can design personalized mathematics learning activities using OER in informal educational settings.
One can apply fraction/decimal operations and basic geometric concepts with over 80% accuracy through OER-based problem-solving tasks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
